title: Strong Social Contribution System
description: In 2022, social contributions accounted for 56.03% of Germany's total revenue, indicating a robust social welfare system.

title: Extended Secondary Education Duration
description: Germany offers a comprehensive secondary education lasting 9 years as of 2023, ensuring a well-rounded academic foundation for students.

title: Low Prevalence of Underweight in Young Females
description: As of 2016, only 0.2% of German girls under 5 were underweight, showcasing effective nutritional and health policies.

title: Minimal Stunting in Young Males
description: In 2016, the prevalence of stunting among boys under 5 in Germany was just 0.4%, reflecting excellent child health standards.

title: Low Overweight Prevalence in Young Males
description: Germany reported only 0.7% of boys under 5 being overweight in 2016, indicating effective early childhood health interventions.

title: Negative Net Capital Account Balance
description: In 2023, Germany's net capital account balance was -$28.71 billion, suggesting more capital outflows than inflows.
